message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a special introductory price of $170. I think you'll find it's a great value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. This product is truly top-notch and worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $120, but that's as high as I can go.
